description:
build: update Makefile to track source code dependencies better
      Also update .hgignore to ignore y.output.

messages.text:
Could you explain what is going on here?
I don't understand what any of these changes do.
I looked up what the :: syntax means and I do not
understand why it applies here.  There is only one
command to run.

On 2012/03/12 16:24:43, rsc wrote:
> Could you explain what is going on here?
> I don't understand what any of these changes do.
> I looked up what the :: syntax means and I do not
> understand why it applies here.  There is only one
> command to run.
Oh, sorry, my original though was wrong.
Only need to change gc/Makefile and .hgignore now.
PTAL.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=55113220acac ***
